Text: This has seven seasons still looking for the other 5

Finally got back on with a new name...WOW!  Thank you so much for this.  I've been looking for this show for quite some time.  Thanks.
Update:  Tried various viewers and get the same result:  Although the quality is quite good, the video is choppy ie: on again off again and the sound gets out of synch failry often.
It's true - the video is choppy and audio gets out of sync often. I've also tried with different players. Unfortunately, it makes it almost unwatchable.
